notice.en:
1. Course level: upper intermediate
2. Students who have studied in EMI, can take the EAP/ESP courses. (Second year, third year, fourth year students only)
3. Students need to attend the first class .
4. Students who have passed the EAP/ESP course
notice.ch:
學術英文(EAP)中高級課程。
1.歡迎大二以上有修習EMI的學生選修課程
2.可抵LN29課號，修課完成後請至語言中心辦理學分抵修。
3.第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績
4.前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生

goal.ch:
修習完本課程，學生能夠： 
1. 辨識各種口說/簡報技巧及自己口語表達的優劣勢 2. 選取參考資料並組織成恰當的簡報內容 
3. 應用各種口說/簡報技巧實際演練 
4. 提高口說/簡報的流暢度、正確度、與專業度
goal.en:
Upon completion of this course, students will be able to:
* Identify various oral presentation skills and assess their own strengths and weaknesses in verbal expression.
* Select reference materials and organize them into appropriate presentation content.
* Apply various oral presentation skills through practical exercises.
* Improve the fluency, accuracy, and professionalism of their oral presentations.

outline.ch:
W1: Course overview Self-introductions
W2: Language Support for Spoken Interactions (in-class feedback 2％)
W3: Presentation Openings (in-class feedback 2％)
W4: Vocal delivery ＆ Body Language (in-class feedback 2％)
W5: Speech Organization: Transitions (in-class feedback 2％)
W6: Midterm Exam (1) : Spoken Interactions (10％)
W7: Midterm review
W8: Visual Aid Design
W9: Speech Organization: How to Simplify the Language ＆ Presentation Closing (in-class feedback 2％)
W10:TED TALK Mimic Speaking (in-class feedback 2％)
W11: Midterm Exam (2): TED TALKs Mimic Speaking (10％)
W12: Presenting figures/numbers (in-class feedback 2％)
W13: Presenting with Graphs (in-class feedback 2％)
W14: Handling Q＆A sessions (in-class feedback 2％)
W15: Final Presentation
W16: Final Presentation (20％)

textbook.ch: 教師整理講義與網路相關資源文本影音
textbook.en: Lecturer‘s compilation of lecture notes and Internet-related resource documents, texts, and multimedia

gradMethod.ch:
出席10％
期中考2次 (10％ x 2)
期末簡報 20％
課堂對組員的回饋 18％ (2％ x 9次)
課後錄影或錄音作業 32％ (4％ x 8 次)
gradMethod.en:
Attendance 10％
Midterms 20％ (10％ x 2 times)
Final presentation 20％
in-class practice and feedback 18％ (2％ x 9 times)
After class audio or video recording assignments 32％ (4％ x 8 times)

ch: 學制:限學士班。年級:限二年級、三年級、四年級。
en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Year:Second Year、Third Year、Fourth Year only.
